The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 01 September is 291,179 (517.3 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 28 August, there were 6,944 new confirmed cases (12.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 August, there were 6,529 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 6% (415 extra cases).
